sense.def:
To seize something
pomeni nekaj hitro in čvrsto prijeti.

seg.quote: I seized him by the collar.

sense.def:
To seize a place
pomeni, da skupina ljudi s silo, hitro in nenadoma prevzame nadzor nad nekim krajem.

seg.quote: The airfield had been seized by US troops.

sense.def:
To seize someone
pomeni nekoga aretirati ali zajeti.

seg.quote: A university professor was seized on Wednesday by three armed men.

sense.def:
To seize an oportunity
pomeni izkoristiti priložnost in narediti tisto, kar si želimo.

seg.quote: Derrick seized the chance and went to Spain.

sense.def:
To seize on something
ali
to seize upon something
pomeni pokazati veliko zanimanje za nekaj, pogosto zato, ker je za nas uporabno ali koristno.

seg.quote: This was one of the points that I seized upon with some force.
...seizing on it as an excuse for a rest period.

sense.def:
Kadar del telesa
seizes up
, nas začne tako boleti, da ga ne moremo premikati; do tega pride zaradi prevelike obremenitve.

Kadar motor
seizes up
, neha delovati, ker se pregreje ali mu zmanjka olja.
